articles.content: In his latest column, Paul Merson says these are worrying times for Arsenal but a top-four finish is still achievable and warns they cannot afford to lose at Chelsea on Wednesday, live on Sky Sports.… [+11516 chars]

articles.content:
Paul Merson believes that Coventry City lack a ruthless streak that was the difference between them and Bournemouth on Monday.

articles.title: Rangers succeed in getting Motherwell trip moved - after Liverpool asked for Newcastle delay - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Fir Park fixture has been switched to Saturday to give Rangers an additional 24 hours' recovery time ahead of the first leg of their semi-final against RB Leipzig in Germany on April 28.
articles.content:
Rangers have succeeded in getting their trip to Motherwell brought forward to give them more time to prepare for the Europa League semi-finals.

articles.description: Sean Dyche was sacked by Burnley on Friday after nine-and-a-half years in charge at Turf Moor, bringing to an end the longest current managerial reign in the Premier League.
